website_summaries.verdict: If you already own a compressor, you'll be in business immediately, once you get this completing tool.
pros: Current customers appreciate not just this product's ease of use, but that it gets the job done from the get go
There is little in the way of extra maintenance or parts needed outside of a compressor
Comes with an attractive price point as well
cons: Some complaints regarding the quality of individual pieces

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this, rent a real sandblaster
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this. It was horrendous to try to use this. First of all, it needs to be hung up high so it’s gravity fed, everything sticks inside of it. No matter what we used I had to continually shake the sand inside the hopper. Gun constantly plugged. Worst piece of equipment we have ever tried to use. We have a big air compressor and had to turn it up higher to get it to do anything. Wishing we would have just did it by hand, it could not have been any worse.
customer_reviews.author: KnJM

customer_reviews.title: No ceramic nozzles included
customer_reviews.text: False advertising. These are not ceramic nozzles. That was the only reason I purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany L

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk
customer_reviews.text: Everything is weak about this nothing is heavy duty. The rubber feed line tore the first time I used it. It constantly clogs. Doesn’t shot enough sand for anything barley removes anything even with my compressed cranked all the way up. I beg you don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Seth c.

customer_reviews.title: Small jobs only
customer_reviews.text: The box the blaster was shipped in look like it feel out of the truck multiple times before it got to me. After taking it out of what was left of the box I noticed a hole in the hopper not big but media still runs out. I was about to find another box and send it back but I wanted to try it first. It really surprised me it will serve my purpose well. You do have to give it a shake when you stop seeing media come out. It's not intended for big jobs so if you have a big project this is not for you. Now I got to see what I can do about the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Great for hobbyist
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what we needed. Blasted some rust off a big piece of equipment. No way you're going to use it running a sandblasting business, but for the odd job, the price makes it perfect. We have a commercial sandblasting company right NEXT DOOR. Still worth buying this to use once. Not that we can't use it again, but the one time we used it, it paid for itself. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Dont wasre your $
customer_reviews.text: This product was a huge waste of money and time. Was such a hassle to get any thing through the feed. I would have been better off using a milk jug with a spout. I cant believe I spent $80 on such a p.o.s. dont waste your money. The product didnt work a broke the first time I used it. Did not get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stotts

customer_reviews.title: works well with decent compressor, see review
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for home/hobby use. Used it to strip some old powder coating off iron chairs and to strip black anodized coating off AR15 parts to prep for Cerakote. You will need a minimum of a 2.5hp 20gal compressor to run this blaster effectively. I also recommend cutting the rubber tube in half for stronger flow of material to gun which means you'll have to be closer to the item to be blasted but overall works well
customer_reviews.author: erik e

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to start redoing furniture. It's perfect for getting into small areas like table legs and chairs where you cant get the sander. I was a mess after using it but it was fun and I loved seeing what it could do.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Birgy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gun works ok but the tips are crap wore through two in under two hours
customer_reviews.author: Judge Judy

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed so far, any suggestions would be amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I can't get any sand to shoot through. It worked briefly once, but not since. Completely flustard, just want it to do what it's supposed to do, shoot sand! WTF!
customer_reviews.author: E. Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Item would not feed sand through and what came out was little to nothing. Do not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Uibul

customer_reviews.title: Can’t find replacement parts.
customer_reviews.text: Item works great with the correct media. The problem is finding the replacement ceramic tips. Can anybody help?
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Fits HF and CH brand blast guns
customer_reviews.text: Received within 2 days. Was a perfect fit for my Campbell Hausfeld blast gun, would also fit Harbor Freight blast gun.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The gun is great but the nozzles wear out quickly and Amazon doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it to sandblast on glass. The gun is great but the nozzles wear out quickly and Amazon doesn't sell replacement nozzles. I have to purchase a whole new set up each time I need a replacement nozzel.
customer_reviews.author: Macha Drake

customer_reviews.title: JUNK..!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst spot blaster I have ever used. Did not work just spit out the material. I am in the automotive business and I can tell you do not buy it definitely not worth it what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: robert m.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: it worked much better than I expected. Have one that came with my blasting cabinet and it didn't work at all. This one is great! I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a sandblaster or siphon gun for cleaning parts with solvent. Anyone with a compressor needs one of these around.
customer_reviews.author: Lowery70

customer_reviews.title: Sand grade an issue
customer_reviews.text: Have tried a few grades of sand and not havung success on our project.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Mart

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This thing couldn't even take surface rust off of22ga sheet metal
customer_reviews.author: Datkins78

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to have if you are doing anything outside of the media cabinet, would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dean G. Hedge

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well at all!!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work well at all. Save your money and invest in a tool that will actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: Catches all the water that I can tell. Can paint with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never got it to work
customer_reviews.text: tried a few different types of sands, got a bigger compressor, never got it to actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Russ D

customer_reviews.title: Fits the gun for the large Harbor Freight bast cabinet ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits the gun for the large Harbor Freight bast cabinet perfectly. Hard to find size, everyone always seems to be out. Usually have to make my own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for all projects requiring some sand blasting!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S Krygielka

customer_reviews.title: A Good Tool
customer_reviews.text: This sand blaster is for medium size to small jobs and etching glass. It does the job and is essentially maintenance free.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeNut

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, just make sure that the hose doesn't kink near the metal siphon as you're using it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: very light duty, had to modify to perform at level that I expected. Drill out air port for more flow, good shipping
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Tips wear out quickly. Pay Attention to them.
customer_reviews.text: Gun is ok at working The nozzles wear out way to fast. I can't find replacement tips or part numbers. So, it looks like my productivity is down while I find a different gun that has readily available tips. I can't wait days to get back to work. I was only able to get 30 mins of use from the nozzles provided. If anyone knows where to find replacements, a review noting would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W. @ Tejas Auto Salon

customer_reviews.title: Good small job blaster
customer_reviews.text: It did exactly what I thought it would. Works great for small jobs. Pretty much maintenance free and simple to use. Didn't have any problems with clogging.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: Just tried this for the first time. 80 gallon compressor regulated at 125psi and this thing did not pass enough air to blast anything. This thing is a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: W. Munn

customer_reviews.title: Great little blaster
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little tool to have on hand. I needed it to sand blast between the fins on a motorcycle engine before it was painted. It had no problem getting the grim off it those tough to reach areas. I was using bake soda for an abrasive and there were no problems. This is great for cleaning small areas, not idea for larger jobs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It did exactly what I hoped for. It's worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchencop

customer_reviews.title: this product is a waste of money do not buy it please i beg ...
customer_reviews.text: this product is a waste of money do not buy it please i beg of you! not one little piece of paint came off my bike when i used it.
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, even with my small compressor. It just takes longer.
customer_reviews.author: Keegan

customer_reviews.title: It's weak at best. Had to use a grinder to get he ...
customer_reviews.text: It's weak at best. Had to use a grinder to get he paint off then blast the rust. Plus you have to keep the hose in the sand which takes two hands to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Adair

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This did not have any power to take off surface rust on my trailer wheels
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

product_meta.title: Performance Tool M549 Portable Abrasive Blaster Kit
product_meta.description: Size:Portable Abrasive Blaster KitRemove rust, paint, graffiti, corrosion and scale. Heavy duty 50lb capacity hopper, aluminum blast gun and 15' material hose. Compatible with any abrasive: silica, sand, glass beads, and pecan shells. Operating pressure: 90psi. Minimum air requirement 3.5cfm at 50psi
feature_bullets: Remove rust, paint, graffiti, corrosion and scale
Heavy duty 50lb capacity hopper, aluminum blast gun and 15' material hose
Compatible with any abrasive: silica, sand, glass beads, and pecan shells.

specifications.Warranty Description: Lifetime Replacement Hand tools. 1 Year on Air tools. excludes blades, bits, punches, dies, bulbs, fuses, grinding wheels, belts and other consumables which must be replaced under normal use and service.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars176 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
